overview.en: In just three years, Oscar resources has grown rapidly into a world-renowned mining resource development company. At present, Oscar resources has nearly 200 square kilometers of gold, iron ore and other large-scale mining areas in Pilbara, Australia. It is the most popular mining development company among global investment. OSG(iOscar Gold) is the investor token of the blockchain brand

under Oscar resources Australia, which is only issued by official channels at present. OSG is a kind of digital currency linked with physical investment gold. Each issued and circulating OSG is linked with one ounce of physical investment gold one by one. The corresponding total investment gold is stored in the Western Australia Mint (i.e. one OSG coin is one ounce of gold).
overview.zh: 在短短三年内，奥斯卡资源公司迅速成长为全球瞩目的矿业资源开发公司，目前拥有澳洲皮尔巴拉地区近200平方公里的金矿，铁矿等大型矿区，是最受全球投资者欢迎的矿业开发公司。OSG(iOscar Gold) 是 澳洲奥斯卡资源公司 旗下区块链品牌「iOscar」的投资者通证，目前仅由官方渠道发放。OSG是一种实物投资黄金挂钩的数字货币，每一个发行流通的OSG都与一盎司实物投资金一比一挂钩，相对应的投资金总量存储在西澳大利亚铸币厂（即一个OSG币为一盎司金）。区块链应用场景中稀缺的优质资产，黄金矿产与数字货币的完美结合，兼具保值增值、安全避险等多重属性。随着澳大利亚西澳 Pilbara 地区 Mt Oscar 金矿项目黄金储量的稳定增长和优质金矿资源的不断储备， OSG通证价值将会得到充分体现。
